description.zh: Cocos Creator 内置了通用的动画系统用以实现基于关键帧的动画。除了支持标准的位移、旋转、缩放动画和帧动画之外，还支持任意组件属性和用户自定义属性的驱动，再加上可任意编辑的时间曲线和创新的移动轨迹编辑功能，能够让内容生产人员不写一行代码就制作出细腻的各种动态效果。
description.en: Cocos Creator has a built-in universal animation system for implementing keyframe-based animations. In addition to standard moving, rotation, scaling and frame animations, it also supports arbitrary component properties and user-defined property drivers, plus arbitrary time curves and innovative trajectory editing, allowing content producers to create detailed dynamic effects without writing a single line of code.
